issue.title: [Java] Introduce wrappers for backward compatibility for ArrowBuf changes in ARROW-3191
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5434](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5434). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Introduce some wrapper methods in ArrowBuf to reduce amount of client changes.
   \* Changes were introduced as part of patch to support arrow buffers on random memory.
